> I see sleepless nights ahead.. Allrighty, we'll keep all that in 
mind while planning our course of action from here on. I think we'll 
get the whole thing compiling first (maybe after replacing the 
assembly), then go from there.

As long as your group works within goals and manageable steps, there 
won't be problems.  That's the big thing about my to-do-list.  It 
breaks things down into steps, with each step being not too big or too 
little.

I am planning on working my way towards having a discussion about new 
specifications for the scenario files so that's why bringing every 
scenario up to version 3.8 is in the list of things to do in the 1st 
phase.

If you guys ever run out of ideas of what to do with the game, I'm 
sure that we can come up with more.
